definition: Yilan county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
Yilan county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: That was the last time Ylang and Edo saw eachother.
sentences.chinese: 這是依蘭和埃都的最後一次見面。

sentences.english: Ylang-ylang oil is made of ylang-ylang tree flowers and some other perfumed oils.
sentences.chinese: 而依蘭油是由依蘭樹花和其他一些芳香油製成的。

sentences.english: Ylang-ylang oil is made of ylang-ylang tree flowers and some other perfumed oils.
sentences.chinese: 而依蘭油是由依蘭樹花和其他一些芳香油製成的。

sentences.english: In Nosy Be, ylang ylang blooms all year round.
sentences.chinese: 要在島，依蘭依蘭開花全年。

sentences.english: In Nosy Be, ylang ylang blooms all year round.
sentences.chinese: 要在島，依蘭依蘭開花全年。

sentences.english: Sanxing, the ancient place name, is Yilan County of Heilongjiang Province today.
sentences.chinese: 三姓，古地名，今黑龍江省依蘭縣。

sentences.english: Aromatherapy Spritzer that combines ylang ylang and sweet orange to help unwind and ease tension.
sentences.chinese: 其精油含有依蘭和甜橙的香味有助於放鬆舒適緊張。

sentences.english: Ylang's parents did not like Edo.
sentences.chinese: 依蘭的父母不喜歡埃都。

sentences.english: Visiting Ylang'sgrave and tree made him glad.
sentences.chinese: 照看依蘭的墳墓和樹讓他非常開心。

sentences.english: Ylang and Edo devised a way to see each other.
sentences.chinese: 依蘭和埃都想出了一個見面的辦法。

sentences.english: He never married and always yearned for Ylang.
sentences.chinese: 他一生未娶，總是想念着依蘭。

sentences.english: From that day on, Ylang's parents never allowed her to leave the house.
sentences.chinese: 自那以後，依蘭的父母再也不允許她離家半步。

definition: tuberose/Cestrum nocturnum, see also 夜香木
